GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.10.112
GSD.description:
net/smc: Fix NULL pointer dereference in smc_pnet_find_ib()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.112 by commit 35b91e49bc80ca944a8679c3b139ddaf2f8eea0f, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit af5f60c7e3d593c2fa31b9a62c16eae75f074de3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/smc: Fix NULL pointer dereference in smc_pnet_find_ib()
